sim.app.noc3d
Class Noc3D

java.lang.Object
  sim.engine.SimState
      sim.app.noc3d.Noc3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Noc3D
extends sim.engine.SimState

Noc3D is a SimState of the application. It contains a continous field which holds all elements such as node_elements, packets, paths, node_units.

Author:
mankas

Method Detail

start

public void start()
Here is the place where the nodes,node_elements,node_units,paths,packets are created.

Overrides:
start in class sim.engine.SimState

setPacket

public void setPacket(double p,
                      double q,
                      double r,
                      java.lang.Object pkts)
setPacket is the method where packets are created. This method is called from the nodeunit class.

Parameters:
p - x-coordinate of the packets location
q - y-coordinate of the packets location
r - z-coordinate of the packets location
pkts - Objects of the packets which are instatiated in nodeunit and passed to the setPacket method during teh call.

setNodeUnit

public void setNodeUnit(double np,
                        double nq,
                        double nr,
                        double tp,
                        double tq,
                        double tr)
In setNodeUnit method nodeunit is created and scheduled at the instance of 10.0.

Parameters:
np - x-coordinate of the nodeunits location
nq - y-coordinate of the nodeunits location
nr - z-coordinate of the nodeunits location
tp - x-coordinate of the packets target location
tq - y-coordinate of the packets target location
tr - z-coordinate of the packets target location

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
